00048 namespace GCF
00049 {
00050 
00051     class GCF_EXPORT_INTERFACE AbstractSharedData
00052     {
00053     public:
00054         AbstractSharedData() : mRefCount(1), mValid(false) { }
00055         virtual ~AbstractSharedData() { }
00056 
00057         void ref() { ++mRefCount; }
00058         void deref() { --mRefCount; if(mRefCount <= 0) delete this; }
00059         int refCount() const { return mRefCount; }
00060         bool isValid() const { return mValid; }
00061         void setValid(bool val=true) { mValid = val; }
00062 
00063     private:
00064         int mRefCount;
00065         bool mValid;
00066     };
00067 
00068     class HourGlass
00069     {
00070     public:
00071         HourGlass() { QApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::WaitCursor); }
00072         ~HourGlass() { QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor(); }
00073     };
00074

00076     {
00077     public:
00078         static QString versionInfoString();
00079         static int     majorVersion();
00080         static int     minorVersion();
00081         static int     revisionNumber();
